LanguageData.ARA_Plasteel_Shell.label: plasteel carapace
LanguageData.ARA_Plasteel_Shell.description: The Arachne insects have strengthened their defenses by directly embedding plasteel into their shells.This surgery does not require the creation of parts and can be performed directly on the Arachne insects.
LanguageData.ARA_Shell_Thorn.label: carapace spine
LanguageData.ARA_Shell_Thorn.description: Two rows of spines are implanted into the shell of the Arachne insect.If it is not in close combat, it will automatically fire spines at nearby enemies to attack.This surgery does not require the creation of any parts and can be performed directly on the Arachne insect.
LanguageData.ARA_Reactive_Shell.label: reactive carapace
LanguageData.ARA_Reactive_Shell.description: The reactive shell of the Arachne insect can only protect it from external damage once. After that, this carapace is thrown away and loses its defensive power. This surgery does not require the creation of any parts and can be performed directly on the Arachne insect.
LanguageData.ARA_Gene_Essence_Shell.label: shell proliferation
LanguageData.ARA_Gene_Essence_Shell.description: The reactive shell of the Arachne insect can only protect it from external damage once. After that, this carapace is thrown away and loses its defensive power. This surgery does not require the creation of any parts and can be performed directly on the Arachne insect.
LanguageData.ARA_Strengthening_Tendon.label: reinforced tendon
LanguageData.ARA_Strengthening_Tendon.description: Arachne insects can move at high speed and gain the ability to jump due to their strengthened tendons.This surgery does not require the creation of parts and can be performed directly on Arachne insects.
LanguageData.ARA_Slide_Patagium.label: gliding membrane
LanguageData.ARA_Slide_Patagium.description: The gliding membranes on the legs of the Arachnid insects allow them to move quickly on the creep, but the effect is immediately lost when they move away from the creep.This surgery does not require the creation of any parts and can be performed directly on the Arachnid insects.
LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Stomach.label: additional gastric sac
LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Stomach.description: Due to the directional mutation of Arachne insects, they have larger stomach sacs and can store more nutrients.This surgery does not require the creation of parts and can be performed directly on Arachne insects.
LanguageData.ARA_Internal_Circulation_Lung.label: internal circulation lung
LanguageData.ARA_Internal_Circulation_Lung.descriptio: Directed mutations in the Arachneid species allow their lungs to self-circulate and withstand near-vacuum attacks.This surgery does not require the creation of any parts and can be performed directly on the Arachneid.
LanguageData.ARA_Cycle_Suppression.label: Life cycle control
LanguageData.ARA_Cycle_Suppression.description: The life cycle inhibitor of Arachne insects prevents the insects themselves from growing disorderly and extends their lifespan.This surgery does not require the production of parts and can be applied directly to Arachne insects.
LanguageData.ARA_Baneling_Pouch.label: Explosive seed capsule
LanguageData.ARA_Baneling_Pouch.description: The pods of the Arachne Insects contain several Arachne Explosive species that are about to hatch, and upon receiving instructions, they immediately burst their bodies and attack the enemy.This surgery does not require the creation of any parts, and can be performed directly on the Arachne Insects.
LanguageData.ARA_Tumor_Pouch.label: Mycocele shedding
LanguageData.ARA_Tumor_Pouch.description: The pods of Arachne insects contain withered fungi, and when released, they turn a wide area of ​​the ground into creep.This surgery does not require the creation of parts and can be performed directly on Arachne insects.
